title: Mini-Ep 226: Cool Kids, Hot Questions
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 226: Cool Kids, Hot Questions
itunes:subtitle: Doree is joined by the very cool Samee Junio while Kate is on vacation. Doree asks them listener questions about how they got into podcast editing, how they're feeling this side of the pandemic, and if they have any cool kid tips for the normies o...
description:
Doree is joined by the very cool Samee Junio while Kate is on vacation. Doree asks them listener questions about how they got into podcast editing, how they're feeling this side of the pandemic, and if they have any cool kid tips for the normies out there.  


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
